name: Dynamic Mesh Distortion with Bezier Curves - Construct 3 Tutorial
name_original: Dynamic Mesh Distortion with Bezier Curves - Construct 3 Tutorial
description:
Hello Everyone!

Tutorial on how to implement dynamic mesh distortion in Construct 3. In this tutorial, I cover how to utilize a bezier curve to make smooth changing platforms. Physics and platformer behaviors paired with the above can be used to make some interesting game play mechanics!

---

GAME CONTROLS:

Click on game to make sure it is "active"

Press 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 to select different platforms

For Left Edge use WASD to move.

For Mid Point use TFGH to move.

For Right Edge use IJKL to move.

---
